scenario_text.value:
Oh, Takuma, Takuma! Something’s sparkling all
purdy back there!

You mean in that dark corner? Wonder what it
is...

Ah, be careful, Agumon! It might be something
dangerous!

Oh, that’s mine, Takuma! That’s the ring
I lost!
How the heck did it get over there...?

At any rate, thank you for finding it,
Takuma.
